## Giá»›i Thiá»‡u / Introduction

**EduProjectSpace** lÃ  há»‡ thá»‘ng quáº£n lÃ½ mÃ´n há»c Ä‘á»“ Ã¡n Ä‘Æ°á»£c phÃ¡t triá»ƒn Ä‘á»ƒ tá»± Ä‘á»™ng hÃ³a vÃ  tá»‘i Æ°u hÃ³a quy trÃ¬nh quáº£n lÃ½ há»c thuáº­t táº¡i cÃ¡c trÆ°á»ng Ä‘áº¡i há»c, Ä‘áº·c biá»‡t táº¡i **HUTECH**. Há»‡ thá»‘ng há»— trá»£ **quáº£n trá»‹ viÃªn**, **trÆ°á»Ÿng bá»™ mÃ´n**, **giáº£ng viÃªn**, vÃ  **sinh viÃªn** trong viá»‡c quáº£n lÃ½ thÃ´ng tin ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng, nhÃ³m, Ä‘á» tÃ i, bÃ i ná»™p, Ä‘iá»ƒm sá»‘, lá»‹ch báº£o vá»‡, tÃ i nguyÃªn, vÃ  tháº£o luáº­n. Vá»›i giao diá»‡n thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, tÃ­ch há»£p cÃ´ng nghá»‡ hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡i nhÆ° **.NET Core 8.0**, **React vá»›i TypeScript**, vÃ  **SQL Server**, **EduProjectSpace** Ä‘áº£m báº£o hiá»‡u suáº¥t cao, báº£o máº­t, vÃ  kháº£ nÄƒng má»Ÿ rá»™ng.

**EduProjectSpace** is a course project management system designed to automate and optimize academic management processes at universities, particularly **HUTECH**. It supports **administrators**, **department heads**, **lecturers**, and **students** in managing user information, groups, projects, submissions, grades, defense schedules, resources, and discussions. Built with modern technologies like **.NET Core 8.0**, **React with TypeScript**, and **SQL Server**, **EduProjectSpace** ensures high performance, security, and scalability.

ğŸ”— **Repository**: [https://github.com/NguyenTriBaoThang/EduProjectSpace](https://github.com/NguyenTriBaoThang/EduProjectSpace)  
ğŸ“š **Wiki**: [https://github.com/NguyenTriBaoThang/EduProjectSpace/wiki](https://github.com/NguyenTriBaoThang/EduProjectSpace/wiki)

## CÃ´ng Nghá»‡ Sá»­ Dá»¥ng / Technologies Used

- **Backend**:

  - **BCrypt**: MÃ£ hÃ³a máº­t kháº©u ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng.
  - **JWT Authentication**: XÃ¡c thá»±c vÃ  phÃ¢n quyá»n API.
  - **HostedService**: TÃ¡c vá»¥ ná»n cho sao lÆ°u dá»¯ liá»‡u vÃ  thÃ´ng bÃ¡o tá»± Ä‘á»™ng.

- **Frontend**:

  - **Fuse.js**: TÃ¬m kiáº¿m má» linh hoáº¡t cho tÃªn Ä‘á» tÃ i, ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng, vÃ  tÃ i liá»‡u.

- **CÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u / Database**:

- **CÃ´ng cá»¥ há»— trá»£ / Tools**:

## Cáº¥u TrÃºc Repository / Repository Structure

```
EduProjectSpace/
â”œâ”€â”€ EduProjectSpace.API/          # Backend (.NET Core 8.0)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Controllers/              # API controllers
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Models/                   # Entity models
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Services/                 # Business logic services
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Data/                     # Database context (Entity Framework Core)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Resources/                # Google credentials and other resources
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ wwwroot/submissions/      # Submission file storage
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ appsettings.json          # Configuration file
â”œâ”€â”€ EduProjectSpace.Web/          # Frontend (React or Static HTML/CSS/JS)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/                      # React source code
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/           # Reusable React components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/                # Page components (Admin, Lecturer, Student)
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ assets/               # Images, styles, and static files
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ App.tsx               # Main React application
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ static/                   # Static HTML/CSS/JS for Live Server
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ index.html            # Main static page
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ styles.css            # Static styles
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ script.js             # Static scripts
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ .env                      # Environment variables for React
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/                         # Documentation and wiki
â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/                      # SQL scripts for database setup
â”œâ”€â”€ tests/                        # Unit and integration tests
â”œâ”€â”€ .gitignore                    # Git ignore file
â”œâ”€â”€ LICENSE                       # MIT License
â””â”€â”€ README.md                     # Project README
```

## HÆ°á»›ng Dáº«n CÃ i Äáº·t vÃ  Triá»ƒn Khai / Setup and Deployment Instructions

Há»‡ thá»‘ng **EduProjectSpace** há»— trá»£ hai phÆ°Æ¡ng Ã¡n triá»ƒn khai frontend: (1) sá»­ dá»¥ng **Live Server** cho giao diá»‡n tÄ©nh (HTML/CSS/JS), vÃ  (2) sá»­ dá»¥ng **React** cho giao diá»‡n Ä‘á»™ng. Backend sá»­ dá»¥ng **.NET Core 8.0** vá»›i cáº¥u hÃ¬nh tá»« file `appsettings.json`.

### 1. YÃªu Cáº§u Há»‡ Thá»‘ng / System Requirements
- **Há»‡ Ä‘iá»u hÃ nh / OS**: Windows, macOS, hoáº·c Linux.
- **CÃ´ng cá»¥ / Tools**:
  - **Node.js** (v18+, chá»‰ cáº§n cho React): [https://nodejs.org/](https://nodejs.org/).
  - **.NET SDK 8.0**: [https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/8.0](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/8.0).
  - **SQL Server 2022**: [https://www.microsoft.com/sql-server](https://www.microsoft.com/sql-server).
  - **Visual Studio Code** vá»›i extension **Live Server** (cho phÆ°Æ¡ng Ã¡n 1): [https://code.visualstudio.com/](https://code.visualstudio.com/).
  - **Visual Studio**, **Postman**: Äá»ƒ phÃ¡t triá»ƒn vÃ  kiá»ƒm tra API.
- **Káº¿t ná»‘i / Connectivity**: Internet á»•n Ä‘á»‹nh Ä‘á»ƒ táº£i gÃ³i vÃ  truy cáº­p GitHub.

### 2. Clone Repository / Clone the Repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/NguyenTriBaoThang/EduProjectSpace.git
cd EduProjectSpace
```

### 3. Cáº¥u HÃ¬nh Backend / Backend Configuration
1. Di chuyá»ƒn vÃ o thÆ° má»¥c backend:
   ```bash
   cd EduProjectSpace.API
   ```
2. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t cÃ¡c gÃ³i NuGet:
   ```bash
   dotnet restore
   ```
3. Táº¡o file `appsettings.json` trong thÆ° má»¥c `EduProjectSpace.API` vá»›i ná»™i dung sau, vÃ  thay tháº¿ cÃ¡c placeholder báº±ng thÃ´ng tin thá»±c táº¿:
   ```json
   {
	 "GoogleCredentialPath": "Resources/credentials.json",
	 "ConnectionStrings": {
	   "DefaultConnection": "Server=[YOUR_SQL_SERVER];Database=EduProject_db;Trusted_Connection=True;TrustServerCertificate=True"
	 },
	 "HuggingFace": {
	   "ApiKey": "[YOUR_HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY]"
	 },
	 "Smtp": {
	   "Host": "smtp.gmail.com",
	   "Port": "587",
	   "Username": "[YOUR_EMAIL]",
	   "Password": "[YOUR_EMAIL_PASSWORD]"
	 },
	 "FileStorage": {
	   "BasePath": "wwwroot/submissions"
	 },
	 "Jwt": {
	   "Key": "[YOUR_JWT_SECRET_KEY]",
	   "Issuer": "EduProjectIssuer",
	   "Audience": "EduProjectAudience"
	 },
	 "Logging": {
	   "LogLevel": {
		 "Default": "Information",
		 "Microsoft.AspNetCore": "Warning"
	   }
	 },
	 "AllowedHosts": "*"
   }
   ```
   - **LÆ°u Ã½**:
	 - `[YOUR_SQL_SERVER]`: TÃªn server SQL (VD: `localhost` hoáº·c `YOUR_SERVER_NAME`).
	 - `[YOUR_HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY]`: API key tá»« HuggingFace.
	 - `[YOUR_EMAIL]`, `[YOUR_EMAIL_PASSWORD]`: TÃ i khoáº£n vÃ  máº­t kháº©u email SMTP (VD: Gmail).
	 - `[YOUR_JWT_SECRET_KEY]`: Chuá»—i bÃ­ máº­t cho JWT (Ã­t nháº¥t 32 kÃ½ tá»±).
	 - Äáº£m báº£o file `Resources/credentials.json` tá»“n táº¡i cho Google API (náº¿u dÃ¹ng).
	 - ThÆ° má»¥c `wwwroot/submissions` Ä‘Æ°á»£c táº¡o Ä‘á»ƒ lÆ°u trá»¯ file bÃ i ná»™p.

4. Cháº¡y migrations Ä‘á»ƒ táº¡o cÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u:
   ```bash
   dotnet ef migrations add InitialCreate
   dotnet ef database update
   ```
5. Cháº¡y backend:
   ```bash
   dotnet run
   ```
   - Backend sáº½ cháº¡y táº¡i `http://localhost:5000/api`.

### 4. CÃ i Äáº·t Frontend / Frontend Setup

#### PhÆ°Æ¡ng Ãn 1: Sá»­ Dá»¥ng Live Server (Giao Diá»‡n TÄ©nh)
1. Di chuyá»ƒn vÃ o thÆ° má»¥c frontend:
   ```bash
   cd EduProjectSpace.Web
   ```
2. Äáº£m báº£o thÆ° má»¥c `static/` chá»©a cÃ¡c file `index.html`, `styles.css`, vÃ  `script.js`.
   - VÃ­ dá»¥ cáº¥u hÃ¬nh `script.js` Ä‘á»ƒ gá»i API:
	 ```javascript
	 const apiUrl = 'http://localhost:5000/api';
	 async function login(username, password) {
	   const response = await fetch(`${apiUrl}/Auth/login`, {
		 method: 'POST',
		 headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
		 body: JSON.stringify({ username, password })
	   });
	   const data = await response.json();
	   console.log(data);
	 }
	 ```
3. Má»Ÿ Visual Studio Code, vÃ o file `static/index.html`, nháº¥p chuá»™t pháº£i vÃ  chá»n **Open with Live Server**.
4. Frontend sáº½ cháº¡y táº¡i `http://localhost:5500` (cá»•ng máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh cá»§a Live Server).

#### PhÆ°Æ¡ng Ãn 2: Sá»­ Dá»¥ng React (Giao Diá»‡n Äá»™ng)
1. Di chuyá»ƒn vÃ o thÆ° má»¥c frontend:
   ```bash
   cd EduProjectSpace.Web
   ```
2. CÃ i Ä‘áº·t cÃ¡c gÃ³i npm:
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```
3. Táº¡o file `.env` trong `EduProjectSpace.Web` vá»›i ná»™i dung:
   ```env
   REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:5000/api
   ```
4. Cháº¡y frontend:
   ```bash
   npm start
   ```
   - Frontend sáº½ cháº¡y táº¡i `http://localhost:3000`.

### 5. Kiá»ƒm Tra Há»‡ Thá»‘ng / Verify the System
- **API**: Má»Ÿ Postman vÃ  kiá»ƒm tra cÃ¡c endpoint táº¡i `http://localhost:5000/api` (xem Swagger táº¡i `/swagger`).
- **Frontend**:
  - **Live Server**: Truy cáº­p `http://localhost:5500` Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm tra giao diá»‡n tÄ©nh.
  - **React**: Truy cáº­p `http://localhost:3000` Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm tra giao diá»‡n Ä‘á»™ng.
- **CÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng SQL Server Management Studio Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm tra báº£ng `Users`, `Courses`, `Projects`, v.v.
- **Logs**: Kiá»ƒm tra nháº­t kÃ½ há»‡ thá»‘ng trong báº£ng `Log` hoáº·c file log Ä‘á»ƒ xÃ¡c minh hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng.

### 6. Triá»ƒn Khai / Deployment
- **Backend**: 
  - Triá»ƒn khai trÃªn Azure hoáº·c AWS vá»›i .NET Core hosting.
  - Cáº­p nháº­t `appsettings.json` vá»›i chuá»—i káº¿t ná»‘i vÃ  thÃ´ng tin thá»±c táº¿.
- **Frontend**:
  - **Live Server**: Äáº©y file tÄ©nh (`static/`) lÃªn Netlify, Vercel, hoáº·c GitHub Pages.
  - **React**: Cháº¡y `npm run build` vÃ  triá»ƒn khai thÆ° má»¥c `build/` trÃªn Vercel, Netlify, hoáº·c AWS S3 vá»›i CloudFront.
- **CÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng Azure SQL Database hoáº·c AWS RDS cho SQL Server.
- **Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh**: Cáº­p nháº­t `REACT_APP_API_URL` trong `.env` (React) hoáº·c `apiUrl` trong `script.js` (Live Server) Ä‘á»ƒ trá» Ä‘áº¿n backend Ä‘Ã£ triá»ƒn khai.

### 7. Dá»n Dáº¹p / Clean Up
- XÃ³a cÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u thá»­ nghiá»‡m vÃ  tÃ i nguyÃªn Ä‘Ã¡m mÃ¢y sau khi kiá»ƒm tra.
- Kiá»ƒm tra chi phÃ­ trÃªn Azure/AWS Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh phÃ¡t sinh.

## HÆ°á»›ng PhÃ¡t Triá»ƒn / Future Development

- **TÃ­ch há»£p AI**: ThÃªm gá»£i Ã½ AI Ä‘á»ƒ láº­p káº¿ hoáº¡ch, dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n rá»§i ro, vÃ  Ä‘á» xuáº¥t tÃ i liá»‡u.
- **á»¨ng dá»¥ng di Ä‘á»™ng**: PhÃ¡t triá»ƒn á»©ng dá»¥ng di Ä‘á»™ng Ä‘á»“ng bá»™ vá»›i web.
- **Báº£o máº­t nÃ¢ng cao**: Ãp dá»¥ng xÃ¡c thá»±c hai yáº¿u tá»‘ (2FA) vÃ  mÃ£ hÃ³a end-to-end.
